topic.title: Expand System Capacity of Yeastar K2 IPPBX
topic.shortdesc: If you need to expand the number of extensions, concurrent calls or other features, contact Yeastar to upgrade your license, and then update your license on your PBX.

section.title: Update methods
section.p: Choose the same update method as the one you choose to update the license according to the environment of your PBX.

section.title: Update license online
section.p: Contact Yeastar to update your license, and confirm the license update on your PBX.

ol.li: Log in the PBX web interface, go to Maintenance Activation , click Update.

p.note: Keep your PBX connected to the internet, or the PBX will be detected as an abnormal device.

section.title: Update license offline (USB Key)
section.p: Contact Yeastar to update your license, you will get a new license, enter the new license on your PBX.

ol.li: Log in the PBX web interface, go to Maintenance Activation , click Update.
Enter your new license, click Activate.

p.note: Keep the USB Key connected to the PBX, or the PBX will be detected as an abnormal device.
